GSD.description:
ALSA: emu10k1: Fix out of bounds access in snd_emu10k1_pcm_channel_alloc()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.213 by commit 45321a7d02b7cf9b3f97e3987fc1e4d649b82da2. For more details please see the references link.
